title: Buy Me: The Complete Series
description: Welcome to the Mistress Auctions!  The Mistresses have been bundled together and now include the novella His First and Only, which was in the For the First Time bundle.  This book includes the entire BUY ME series, featuring a menage, a light BDSM story, a virgin hero and heroine, and a winter/summer romance.  There's a taste for everyone in here, so go on and take a bite.  Warning: BUY ME is full of alpha heroes, sassy heroines, and lots of gooey steam. It's sweet enough, dirty enough, and gosh darn it, people love it.
author: Alexa Riley
